article_node.title: Reese Witherspoon says she was 'deliriously tired' raising kids in Hollywood: 'I'd cry working 14 to 17 hours'
article_node.summary: Reese Witherspoon shares a candid Instagram carousel about juggling her Hollywood career and motherhood, featuring photos of her three children over the years. She describes long work hours, late nights, and the challenge of balancing set demands with family life, yet emphasizes the perspective and joy her kids bring. Witherspoon concludes that despite the difficulties, being a mother has helped her focus on what truly matters and provides a meaningful counterbalance to her professional commitments.
